## SchemaDefinition.InferRequiredProperty type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type InferRequiredProperty<T> = T extends SchemaDefinition.ObjectType ? T & {
        required?: (keyof T["properties"])[];
        dependentRequired?: {
            [key in keyof T["properties"]]: (keyof T["properties"])[];
        };
    } : T;
```
